description:
Space Officer Poyon comes to Earth for a tete-a-tete with Paul the super-butler, and the Keroro Platoon has to help arrange it, or they`ll all be arrested. Then in a Kero Zero tale, the platoon discovers an unknown planet covered in snow on the way to Earth. They take a shuttle to the surface to determine whether the snow can be melted into potable water, but then they lose all power...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Poyon, Miracle Paul Operation! / Kero Zero, Snow is a Merciless Queen of the Night
ポヨン ポールにミラクル大作戦! / ケロ0 雪は無慈悲な夜の女王
